Detailed Description

Represents a 3 dimensional vector.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

chaos::gfx::Vector3::Vector3 ( )

Default constructor.

Creates a new Vector3 with the x, y, and z components initialized as 0.

chaos::gfx::Vector3::Vector3 ( float  x,
float  y,
float  z 
)

Component constructor.

Creates a new Vector3 with the given x, y, and z component values.

chaos::gfx::Vector3::Vector3 ( float  scalar)

Scalar constructor.

Creates a new Vector3 with the x, y, and z components initialised to the given scalar.

chaos::gfx::Vector3::Vector3 ( const Vector3 &  other)

Copy constructor.

Creates a new copy of the given Vector3.

Vector3& chaos::gfx::Vector3::operator= ( const Vector3 &  other)

Assignment operator.

Assigns the values of this Vector3 to be a copy of the values of the other given Vector3.

Parameters
otherVector3 to copy data from.
Returns

bool chaos::gfx::Vector3::operator== ( const Vector3 &  other) const

Equality operator.

Compares whether this Vector3 and the other given Vector3 are considered "equal". A comparison of the components of the vector is performed using chaos::math::float_equals using he default values for delta_threshold and ulps_threshold.

Parameters
otherVector3 to compare this vector against.
Returns
Whether the vectors are considered equal.
bool chaos::gfx::Vector3::operator!= ( const Vector3 &  other) const

Inequality operator.

Compares this Vector3 and the other given Vector3 are not considered "equal". See Vector3::operator== for further information.

Parameters
otherVector3 to compare this vector against.
Returns
Whether the vectors are not considered equal.
